Token.Abstract: Factory class which takes in SKTDownloadObjectHelper and generates SKTGroupedDownloadOperation objects.

Creates a SKTGroupedDownloadOperation object from a SKTDownloadObjectHelper. SKTGroupedDownloadOperation contains multiple SKTGroupedOperations. For example a map download will contain 3 SKTGroupedOperations (Map, Name browser zip, texture file).

Parameter.Name: downloadHelper
Parameter.Abstract: The SKTDownloadObjectHelper object containing information regarding the download.
